entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this morning and ending this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023
